Mobileer Orchestra Editor

Aliasing an Instrument

MIDI can have up to 128 Instrument in a bank. But you may not need that many Instruments. ALso you may want to use the same instrument for more than one MIDI program. The Piccolo and the Flute program could both use a Flute Instrument.

  1. To alias the Piccolo to use whatever Instrument the Flute is using, scroll down to #73 Piccolo.
  2. Click on the button continuing an Instrument name and a dialog will appear. (It may already be aliased to Flute.)
  3. Check the Alias button and then select the Flute from the list of Programs.
  4. Click OK.
